name: Guitarhythm
description:
Guitars, endless routes (actually it ends when you finish the song) and chievos (sssh, work in progress.)!
Guitarhythm is a jam game made by JTK team in OYGEM Hackathon. It heavily inspired from Super Crazy Guitar Maniac Deluxe flash game series by SecondImpact.
This game also uses same inputs for Keyboard-Guitar feeling. This game has dark and Heavy Metalish aura, but simple graphics for relaxing but challenging gameplay.

Controls : 

1, 2, 3, 4 and arrow keys

Game Developers :  

Enes Çubuk

Emirhan Baykal

Game Designer :

Oğuzhan Hüseyin Kayalı

Game Artist :

Yaren Çetinkaya
